actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that the survivors of a veteran who was rated totally and permanently service-connected disabled for a period of at least one year would be automatically entitled to dependency and indemnity compensation.

summary.text: Provides that the survivors of a veteran with a service-connected disability rated total and permanent for at least one year shall be automatically entitled to dependency and indemnity compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that the survivors of a veteran who was rated totally and permanently service-connected disabled for a period of at least one year would be automatically entitled to dependency and indemnity compensation.
